originalText.text: Ms.Sharon told me the company was Hiring but then when I called Mr.English made it seem like he ain’t wanna hire nobody … smh no wonder everybody saying this company bad !! They need new management and all

text.text: Ms.Sharon told me the company was Hiring but then when I called Mr.English made it seem like he ain’t wanna hire nobody … smh no wonder everybody saying this company bad !! They need new management and all

originalText.text: I have been working with this company for 5 years and Terry English has been an incredible CEO. He’s a very compassionate human being. Just be honest and truthful as a guard or supervisor and your work experience with this company will be amazing. The best so far!

text.text: I have been working with this company for 5 years and Terry English has been an incredible CEO. He’s a very compassionate human being. Just be honest and truthful as a guard or supervisor and your work experience with this company will be amazing. The best so far!

originalText.text: No comment company is theeeee worst would never recommend them

text.text: No comment company is theeeee worst would never recommend them

originalText.text: This company is terrible.  They don't care about their employees. They run you around for your sick days and vacation money. I had to report them for my owed sick pay. They sent me a W2 and I hadn't worked for them in 2yrs. I tried to ask them about it and was sent to the owner's voicemail. They never got back go me... Don't do it to yourself.... I want to give them zero stars but I couldn't.

text.text: This company is terrible.  They don't care about their employees. They run you around for your sick days and vacation money. I had to report them for my owed sick pay. They sent me a W2 and I hadn't worked for them in 2yrs. I tried to ask them about it and was sent to the owner's voicemail. They never got back go me... Don't do it to yourself.... I want to give them zero stars but I couldn't.

originalText.text:
By the looks of how the employer responds i can definitely tell this company is bad. I was just about to apply because i live right across the street from one of their sites. I saw a guard so tired i was confused on why and I now i see why.

REPLY TO YOUR RESPONSE TO PRIME; FIRST OFF I NEVER APPLIED FOR YOUR SKETCHY JOB YOU PLAY WITH MY MONEY YOU PLAYING WITH YALL LIVES. So trust me you would never see MY name in yall system. Good luck for the next 5 years thou. Its sad not even recruiters want to promote or help get you guys some guards. Like ew. I would never work for something like this. I got my own security job as FSLD and trust me this company not WORTH to have a position like this!
